mork
Class MorkDocument

java.lang.Object
  mork.MorkDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener
public class MorkDocument
extends Object
implements EventListener

A Mork Document represents a Mork database and provides structured access to the whole document at once (in contrast to the Mork Parser, which is event-based)

Author:
mhaller

Constructor Summary
MorkDocument(Reader reader)
          Creata a new Mork Document using the given content
 
Method Summary
 List<Dict> getDicts()
          Returns all dictionaries found in the Mork document
 List<Row> getRows()
          Returns a list of all rows which were not inherited in tables found in the Mork document

          Returns a list of tables
